title: [Bad]  Device Data may be collected when you interact with Groupon, even if you are not logged into the Site.

tosdr.case: [Bad]  Device Data may be collected when you interact with Groupon, even if you are not logged into the Site.-bad-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Bad]  Your Device Data may be collected when your device interacts with the Site and Groupon, even if you are not logged into the Site using your device.
